reviews.review:
I have decided to NOT recommend this game after finding out the creators of the game are partnering with a company that uses NFTs so they can push their latest DLC. 

https://twitter.com/DeadByBHVR/status/1450568419083005962?s=20

If you like to suffer, play survivor and that's all you gotta do to end up in the E.R with an aneurysm.

If you like to make others suffer, play killer and make the player base suffer even more than it already does with this unbalanced game.

YEAH I SAID IT

do you like entitled surviors?
do you like bitchin in moaning in a end game chat lobby?
do you tunnel the key user?
have you learned camping only helps them?
Well if so this game causes erectile dysfunction dealing with the other side of the player base. Pure aids.

Great Game
Haha the bushes scream when you smack them in this game.
This game makes me want to rip out my spleen in frustration (10/10 would play again)
me gustó. mejor jugar por lo menos con un amigo si sos superviviente.

이 게임은 생존마들이 엔티티님이 만들어낸 커여운 피조물들을 유린하는 게임입니다.
당신이 만약 그 피조물이 되길 선택한다면 수많은 고통의 시간동안 그것들을 인내해야 할것입니다,
its a really run game my friend got me into this 10000000/10
then nurse is lowkey a hot milf if you look hard enough.
This game is awful please don't play it if you like a balanced experience but if you don't really care about balance or sometimes even fun this game is for you!
thought it was gonna be bad, but it was fire
Me hizo echarme el semestre, recomendadisimo
Great game but i just dont understand why they havent implemented a voice chat or something it is so frustrating if you have a rando in your team please add a talk system
wont frickin open ii hate laptops
Ok... so yeah,  would recommend this game. over 2500 hours spent playing it now. Time flies

DBD is a great game, the devs care about their game and the constant updates and new content is fantastic.

Survive with your friends is great, or become the killer and hunt down your prey, you choose.
great game to play with your friends and fun when u play kill your friends and tunnel your rank 1 friend
Prepare for a tunnel and slug est and watch out out for p3 blendette's

so id play the gamE and when i the kill killde the serve ivor my friend ER SAGTE "kil cominged over" i laughed greatly with the most joyous grin upon my chops. then i sai d "COME LOLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL" and £££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££££'# so i rate it a
great game but i will have to say cheaters are common and very bold the devs dont do anything about it
Isn gutes Game (wenn man Freunde hat, nur Killer bockt net). Durch so nh Russen hab ich plötzlich alle Achievements
10/10 if u want to get tunneld and camped for life

Es un Juego Divertido si lo jugas con amigos, por la tension q sentís al que te este persiguiendo el killer y empezas a boludearlo con ventanas y pales. te podes encontrar gente amistosa que te ayuda a conseguir puntos, o podes encontrar toxicos, facecampers, tuneleros. Fuera de todo eso es un buen juego lo recomiendo. Ta bueno Compralo :)
fun gam. prestige 3 nurse. wish i could 100% the game without buying like every killer tho :((
Если вам пострадать,то вам именно сюда

its pretty fun with friends untill the small pp guys take "the doctor" and than every second of gameplay becomes a living hell
do NOT play this game unless you have mazochistich masochistic inclinations
Un juego fresco como de madrugada
Great game, even better with friends, will say the game is mostly in favor of killers with perks like nurses calling but it is still a great game

I liked that every killer makes you change your play style it takes time to learn how killers will react and how you should react appropriatly to counter them to win however I didn't like the newest killer nemesis due to his added affect of zombies he doesn't bother me other then the zombies he was one of my favorite villians from the resident evil franchise so even through that bias he's a little over powered because he has extra help in the form of the zombies
This game is very fun, especially playing with friends on this game :) Totally recommend  this game to others!
would definitely  recommend if you're interested in horror and survival genre games! and a great way to exercise a brain aneurysm (joke)

El momento en que me di cuenta que era Amanda Young(SAW) en la Midwitch Highschool de Silent HIll persiguiendo a Jill Valentine, en ese momento me di cuenta que esto es una joya. Recomendadisimo, es la Hall of Fame del terror <3
Лучшая игра чтобы потерять своё время в помойке, Советую к покупки только DLC  без самой игры ))))
Faut pas se dire qu'on va flipper au bout de 5-6h de jeu les tueurs on les troll oklm
i like how thrilling it is but the killers are op as hell and all of them need to be nerfed
Great fun to play with friends

Only play this game if you're good. If you're not, prepare to rage a lot. 
Quite a bit of hardcore players which will mess with your mind.

Insanely fun playing with friends.
